long_description: Reduce harmful pressure on the Ulnar nerve and artery and the Median nerve, and ensure superior comfort with RX-Grips. Strategically located Ulnar Groove reduces hand and finger fatigue. Outer layer Dual Density grips absorb shock to reduce numbness and hand fatigue. Hard inner core grips a handlebar like a vice. Grooved rubber design allows perspiration to evaporate quickly to keep hands drier.
short_description: Reduce harmful pressure on the Ulnar nerve and artery and the Median nerve, and ensure superior comfort with RX-Grips.
